Key Match Events: Dhananjaya de Silva guided Sri Lanka to a comprehensive victory over Afghanistan with a score of 66 off just 42 balls.
Mujeeb Ur Rahman took an early wicket for Afghanistan.
Rashid Khan took two wickets for Afghanistan but it was not enough to secure a win.
Charith Asalanka and Bhanuka Rajapaksa played supporting roles for Dhananjaya de Silva.
Afghanistan's bowlers failed to take wickets in quick succession, allowing Sri Lanka to accumulate runs steadily.
Afghanistan will exit the tournament with this loss.
